name: Chromatic Blaze - GMTK GameJam 2021 entry
description:
My entry for GMTK GameJam 2021

Controls:
Use WASD or IJKL for movement
Space bar to shoot
Use your mouse to tell the crew to attack but also protect.

Tools used:
Vanilla JavaScript for core game code (don't judge ;P)
THREEjs + GSAP graphics and animation
Photoshop for pixel art
Magicavoxel for 3D models

All content made by me
Built in 48 hours
